Talents.Name: Shadow Weaver
Talents.Description: The first hit on each enemy Binds the target for 5 seconds and Steals 90 ATK (effect expires when enemy is defeated or <Operator Name> retreats)

Talents.Name: Shadow Sentry
Talents.Description: Enemies within attack range lose Invisibility and have -30% Movement Speed; after retreating, <Operator Name> leaves behind a Shadow Sentry with the same effect (Max 1)
